sub_rules.content:
Each type variable is named in one of two styles:

A single capital letter, optionally followed by a single numeral (such as E, T, X, T2)
A name in the form used for classes (see Section 5.2.2, Class names), followed by the capital letter T (examples: RequestT, FooBarT).
sub_rules.formalization: type_variable.name must be constrained to be ( A single capital letter, optionally followed by a single numeral ∨ A name in the form used for classes (see Section 5.2.2, Class names), followed by the capital letter T)
